title: Effective Communication Design in Multicultural Environments: Practice-Centered Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theory and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: A training program for elementary school teachers focusing on developing culturally responsive teaching materials for multicultural students.

learning_goals: Analyze non-verbal communication characteristics across cultures and apply them to instructional materials.
Develop educational content design proposals that reflect cultural differences in learning styles.
Propose strategies for using visual aids to reduce communication barriers in multicultural environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
